titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Bureau of Labor Statistics alone should make any adjustments, if any are needed, to the methodology used to determine the Consumer Price Index.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 3/12/1997--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Bureau of Labor Statistics alone should make any adjustments, if any are needed, to the methodology used to determine the Consumer Price Index.
